name: The Golden Cross Demo
description:
The Golden Cross is a plot based game targeted at causal gamers who enjoy a mix of dialogue, action, adventure and puzzles.  Or those players that need a break from their intense hard core games.  So take a trip back to the basics and easy play.

This download is actually Chapter One of the game, an action chapter that takes about 30-60 minutes to play.  It will give you an opportunity to try out the game on your platform.   

The full game contains 30 chapters with a mix of action, adventure, plot, puzzles, multiple sets and a  host of characters.   

Look for the full game on Steam on Feb 26th.

Feedback is appreciated.  Email thegoldencross315@gmail.com
